remarks: A restricted polynomial algebra has the same base set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)
statement:
ressmpl.s $e |- S = ( I mPoly R ) $.
ressmpl.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
ressmpl.u $e |- U = ( I mPoly H ) $.
ressmpl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` U ) $.
ressmpl.1 $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
ressmpl.2 $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) $.
ressmpl.p $e |- P = ( S |`s B ) $.
ressmplbas $p |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` P ) ) $.
